column1: # Readings for January to April 1929 were taken at a site which was soon abandoned, and have been omitted.
# The gauge at the Ampleforth station 3457 site took over from the original Ampleforth station 3456 site at the start of 1931.
# The detailed location of this site at Ampleforth is not clear. The grid reference is indicative.
# There seems to have been a move of about 100 yards in 1955.
# The station continued until 1972 according to MIDAS.
